[] console.log(pegarLocalStorage()) console.log(productsIDs) const handleSubmit = (e) =>{ e.preventDefault() setProductsIDs(id) const dbCLient = pegarLocalStorage() dbCLient.push(productsIDs) guardarLocalStorage(dbCLient) } return(

{category}
